name: Academy Raider
ability: Intimidate #_(This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)_#£Whenever Academy Raider deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

name: Accorder's Shield
flavor: #_An Auriok shield is polished to a mirror finish even on the inside, enabling its bearer to watch foes ahead and behind._#
ability: Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance. #_(Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)_#£Equip {3} #_({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)_#

name: Accursed Spirit
flavor: #_Many have heard the slither of dragging armor and the soft squelch of its voice. But only its victims ever meet its icy gaze._#
ability: Intimidate #_(This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)_#

name: Act of Treason
flavor: #_"Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison."—Sarkhan Vol_#
ruling: £10/1/2009 : Act of Treason can target any creature, even one that's untapped or one you already control. £8/15/2010 : Gaining control of a creature doesn't cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it.
ability: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. #_(It can attack and {T} this turn.)_#

name: Advocate of the Beast
flavor: #_"I am neither their drover nor their leader. To these majestic beasts, I am simply their herdmate and nothing more."_#
ability: At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on target Beast creature you control.

name: Air Servant
flavor: #_"Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered."—Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity_#
ability: Flying£{2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.

name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
ruling: £7/1/2012 : You can activate the first ability without a target. You'll still put one loyalty counter on Ajani when you activate the ability. £7/1/2012 : The number of Cat tokens you put onto the battlefield is equal to your life total when the third ability resolves.
ability: +1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.£-3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.£-8: Put X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is your life total.
name_JP: 群れの統率者アジャニ

name: Ajani's Chosen
flavor: #_"United, our roar will level mountains."_#
ability: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, put a 2/2 white Cat creature token onto the battlefield. If that enchantment is an Aura, you may attach it to the token.
name_JP: アジャニに選ばれし者

name: Altar's Reap
flavor: #_"Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible."—Gorghul, augur of skulls_#
ruling: £9/22/2011 : You can't sacrifice more than one creature to cast Altar's Reap. £9/22/2011 : You sacrifice a creature when you pay other costs to cast Altar's Reap. The creature will already be in its owner's graveyard by the time any player gets a chance to respond. £4/15/2013 : You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures. £4/15/2013 : Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.
ability: As an additional cost to cast Altar's Reap, sacrifice a creature.£Draw two cards.

name: Angelic Accord
flavor: #_As demons are drawn to suffering, angels are drawn to acts of benevolence._#
ability: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

name: Angelic Wall
flavor: #_"The air stirred as if fanned by angels' wings, and the enemy was turned aside."—Tales of Ikarov the Voyager_#
ability: Defender #_(This creature can't attack.)_#£Flying

name: Archaeomancer
flavor: #_"Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."_#
ruling: £7/1/2012 : If an instant or sorcery spell puts Archaeomancer onto the battlefield, you can return that card to your hand.
ability: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Archangel of Thune
flavor: #_Even the wicked have nightmares._#
ability: Flying£Lifelink #_(Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)_#£Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

name: Armored Cancrix
flavor: #_Creatures displaced from time still turn up every year, stranded by the temporal disaster that once swept across Dominaria._#
name_JP: 装甲のカンクリックス

name: Artificer's Hex
flavor: #_"Some treasures aren't worth finding, let alone stealing."—Dack Fayden_#
ability: Enchant Equipment£At the beginning of your upkeep, if enchanted Equipment is attached to a creature, destroy that creature.

name: Auramancer
flavor: #_"In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."_#
ability: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Awaken the Ancient
flavor: #_Some days you stand to greet the horizon. Other days the horizon stands to greet you._#
ability: Enchant Mountain£Enchanted Mountain is a 7/7 red Giant creature with haste. It's still a land.

name: Banisher Priest
flavor: #_"Oathbreaker, I cast you out!"_#
ability: When Banisher Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield. #_(That creature returns under its owner's control.)_#

name: Barrage of Expendables
flavor: #_Goblin generals don't distinguish between troops and ammunition._#
ability: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Barrage of Expendables deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Battle Sliver
flavor: #_"One emitted a strange series of buzzing clicks and guttural commands, then clawed arms emerged from all of them. Is there no limit to their adaptations?"—Hastric, Thunian scout_#
ability: Sliver creatures you control get +2/+0.

name: Blessing
flavor: #_"Virtue can't survive without strength."—Ardanna of the Angelic Council_#
ability: Enchant creature£{W}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Blightcaster
flavor: #_"Your flesh is unprepared for my gifts."_#
ability: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Blood Bairn
flavor: #_The travelers were warned to watch out for children on the road._#
ability: Sacrifice another creature: Blood Bairn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Blur Sliver
flavor: #_They move in a synchronized swarm, turning entire squads into heaps of bloody rags and bones in an instant._#
ability: Sliver creatures you control have haste. #_(They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)_#

name: Bogbrew Witch
flavor: #_"The hardest thing is finding the right ingredients."_#
ability: {2}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Festering Newt or Bubbling Cauldron, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Bonescythe Sliver
flavor: #_"Their appendages are sharper than our swords and quicker than our bows."—Hastric, Thunian scout_#
ability: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. #_(They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)_#

name: Bramblecrush
flavor: #_Nature abhors a lot of things._#
ability: Destroy target noncreature permanent.

name: Brave the Elements
ruling: £10/1/2009 : You choose a color as Brave the Elements resolves. Once the color is chosen, it's too late for players to respond. £10/1/2009 : Only white creatures you control at the time Brave the Elements resolves gain the protection ability. Creatures that come under your control later in the turn, or that turn white later in the turn, won't have it.
ability: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn. #_(They can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything of that color.)_#

name: Briarpack Alpha
flavor: #_"One of my greatest teachers."—Garruk Wildspeaker_#
ability: Flash #_(You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)_#£When Briarpack Alpha enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
name_FR: Alpha de la meute de bruyère
name_ES: Alfa de la Manada del Brezo

name: Brindle Boar
flavor: #_"Tell the cooks to prepare the fires. Tonight we feast!"—Tolar Wolfbrother, Krosan tracker_#
ruling: £8/15/2010 : If you sacrifice an attacking or blocking Brindle Boar during the declare blockers step, it won't deal combat damage. If you wait until the combat damage step, but Brindle Boar is dealt lethal damage, it'll be destroyed before you get a chance to sacrifice it.
ability: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.

name: Bubbling Cauldron
ability: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 4 life.£{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature named Festering Newt: Each opponent loses 4 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

name: Burning Earth
flavor: #_"Your world is formed from the same power that wraps my burning hand around your throat."—Shrazik, lavamancer_#
ability: Whenever a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, Burning Earth deals 1 damage to that player.

name: Cancel
ability: Counter target spell.

name: Canyon Minotaur
flavor: #_"We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side.""Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?""Yes.""So shouldn't we—""No."_#

name: Capashen Knight
flavor: #_He protects Benalia as much with his reputation as with his force of arms._#
ability: First strike #_(This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)_#£{1}{W}: Capashen Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Celestial Flare
flavor: #_"You were defeated the moment you declared your aggression."—Gideon Jura_#
ability: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.

name: Chandra, Pyromaster
ability: +1: Chandra, Pyromaster deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player controls. That creature can't block this turn.£0: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.£-7: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.
name_JP: 紅蓮の達人チャンドラ

name: Chandra's Outrage
flavor: #_Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."_#
ruling: £8/15/2010 : The player who's dealt damage is the player who controls the targeted creature at the time Chandra's Outrage resolves. £8/15/2010 : If the targeted creature is an illegal target by the time Chandra's Outrage resolves, the entire spell is countered. No player is dealt damage.
ability: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

name: Chandra's Phoenix
ability: Flying£Haste #_(This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)_#£Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a red instant or sorcery spell you control or by a red planeswalker you control, return Chandra's Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.
name_JP: チャンドラのフェニックス

name: Charging Griffin
flavor: #_Four claws, two wings, one beak, no fear._#
ability: Flying£Whenever Charging Griffin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Child of Night
flavor: #_Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night._#
ability: Lifelink #_(Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)_#

name: Claustrophobia
flavor: #_Six feet of earth muffled his cries._#
ruling: £9/22/2011 : Claustrophobia can target and enchant an untapped creature. £9/22/2011 : The enchanted creature can still be untapped in other ways, such as by Village Bell-Ringer's ability.
ability: Enchant creature£When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.£Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Clone
flavor: #_He knows your strengths, your weaknesses, and the shape of that unfortunate birthmark on your backside._#
ruling: £7/15/2007 : If the chosen creature is copying something else (for example, if the chosen creature is another Clone), then your Clone enters the battlefield as whatever the chosen creature copied. £7/15/2007 : If the chosen creature is a token, Clone copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that put it onto the battlefield. Clone is not a token. £7/15/2007 : Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when Clone enters the battlefield. Any "as [this creature] enters the battlefield" or "[this creature] enters the battlefield with" abilities of the chosen creature will also work. £10/1/2009 : If the chosen creature has {X} in its mana cost (such as Protean Hydra), X is considered to be zero. £7/1/2012 : Clone copies exactly what was printed on the original creature and nothing more (unless that creature is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn't copy whether that creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on. £7/1/2012 : If Clone somehow enters the battlefield at the same time as another creature, Clone can't become a copy of that creature. You may only choose a creature that's already on the battlefield. £7/1/2012 : You can choose not to copy anything. In that case, Clone enters the battlefield as a 0/0 Shapeshifter creature, and is probably put into the graveyard immediately.
ability: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

name: Colossal Whale
ability: Islandwalk #_(This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)_#£Whenever Colossal Whale attacks, you may exile target creature defending player controls until Colossal Whale leaves the battlefield. #_(That creature returns under its owner's control.)_#

name: Congregate
flavor: #_"In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing."—Song of All, canto 642_#
ruling: £10/4/2004 : Creatures are counted during resolution.
ability: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.

name: Coral Merfolk
flavor: #_Early sailors thought they were tricks of the mind or perhaps manatees. As more and more ships were classified as lost to "manatee attacks," the truth began to dawn._#

name: Corpse Hauler
flavor: #_"He expects a reward, but the only piece of silver he'll get from me is my blade in his gut."—Shelac, necromancer_#
ability: {2}{B}, Sacrifice Corpse Hauler: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Corrupt
flavor: #_One misstep in the swamp and the evil that sleeps beneath will rise to find you._#
ruling: £10/4/2004 : The swamps are counted on resolution.  £8/15/2010 : The life you gain is equal to the damage dealt by Corrupt, not necessarily to the number of Swamps you control (if some or all of the damage is prevented, for example). £8/15/2010 : The amount of damage dealt to a creature is not bounded by its toughness, and the amount of damage dealt to a player is not bounded by that player's life total. For example, if Corrupt deals 6 damage to a 2/2 creature, you'll gain 6 life.
ability: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

name: Cyclops Tyrant
flavor: #_A single eye, blinded by rage._#
ability: Intimidate #_(This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)_#£Cyclops Tyrant can't block creatures with power 2 or less.

name: Dark Favor
flavor: #_When he began to curse what he held holy, his strength grew unrivaled._#
ruling: £9/22/2011 : If the creature targeted by Dark Favor is an illegal target when Dark Favor tries to resolve, Dark Favor will be countered. It won't enter the battlefield and its enters-the-battlefield ability won't trigger.
ability: Enchant creature£When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life.£Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.

name: Dark Prophecy
flavor: #_When the bog ran short on small animals, Ekri turned to the surrounding farmlands._#
ability: Whenever a creature you control dies, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

name: Darksteel Forge
flavor: #_"It is as if this world has been expecting our blessings."—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite_#
ability: Artifacts you control have indestructible. #_(Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them. Artifact creatures with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)_#
name_JP: ダークスティールの溶鉱炉

name: Darksteel Ingot
flavor: #_"It reflects the purity of Mirrodin-that-was."—Koth of the Hammer_#
ability: Indestructible #_(Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.)_#£{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
name_JP: ダークスティールの鋳塊

name: Dawnstrike Paladin
flavor: #_She crushes darkness beneath her charger's hooves._#
ability: Vigilance #_(Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)_#£Lifelink #_(Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)_#

name: Deadly Recluse
flavor: #_Even dragons fear its silken strands._#
ability: Reach #_(This creature can block creatures with flying.)_#£Deathtouch #_(Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)_#

name: Deathgaze Cockatrice
flavor: #_"Sometimes I come across a stone finger or foot and I know I'm in cockatrice territory."—Rulak, bog guide_#
ability: Flying£Deathtouch #_(Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)_#

name: Demolish
flavor: #_"This is why I hate settlements. They lull you into a false sense of security."—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist_#
ability: Destroy target artifact or land.

name: Devout Invocation
flavor: #_A prayer to bring demons to their knees._#
ability: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each creature tapped this way.

name: Diabolic Tutor
flavor: #_The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power._#
ability: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Dismiss into Dream
flavor: #_"You trust in the shadows of a breeze."—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage_#
ability: Each creature your opponents control is an Illusion in addition to its other types and has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

name: Disperse
flavor: #_Gryffid found his way home and resumed life as best he could, constantly hiding his newfound fear of clouds._#
ability: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Divination
flavor: #_"The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle_#
ability: Draw two cards.

name: Divine Favor
flavor: #_With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people._#
ruling: £9/22/2011 : If the creature targeted by Divine Favor is an illegal target when Divine Favor tries to resolve, Divine Favor will be countered. It won't enter the battlefield and its enters-the-battlefield ability won't trigger.
ability: Enchant creature£When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.£Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

name: Domestication
ruling: £6/15/2010 : Domestication's triggered ability has an "intervening 'if' clause." That means (1) the ability triggers only if the enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater as your end step begins, and (2) the ability does nothing if the enchanted creature's power is 3 or less by the time it resolves. £6/15/2010 : Domestication can target, and can enchant, a creature with power 4 or greater. The enchanted creature's power is checked only when the triggered ability triggers and resolves. £6/15/2010 : If an effect changes the enchanted creature's power until end of turn, it will still have the modified power during your end step.
ability: Enchant creature£You control enchanted creature.£At the beginning of your end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, sacrifice Domestication.

name: Doom Blade
ability: Destroy target nonblack creature.

name: Door of Destinies
ruling: £4/1/2008 : If you cast a creature spell of the chosen type, Door of Destinies will get a charge counter before the creature enters the battlefield. The creature will enter the battlefield with the additional boost to its power and toughness.
ability: As Door of Destinies enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.£Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, put a charge counter on Door of Destinies.£Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1 for each charge counter on Door of Destinies.

name: Dragon Egg
flavor: #_Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs._#
ability: Defender #_(This creature can't attack.)_#£When Dragon Egg dies, put a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. It has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

name: Dragon Hatchling
flavor: #_"Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth."—Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer_#
ability: Flying£{R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Duress
flavor: #_"It hurts more if you think about it."—Hooks, Cabal torturer_#
ability: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

name: Elite Arcanist
ability: When Elite Arcanist enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card from your hand.£{X}, {T}: Copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. X is the converted mana cost of the exiled card.

name: Elixir of Immortality
flavor: #_"Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect."—Baron Sengir_#
ruling: £8/15/2010 : Paying the activation cost of Elixir of Immortality's ability doesn't cause it to leave the battlefield. If you have a way to untap it, you can activate the ability multiple times in response to itself. £9/22/2011 : As the ability resolves, you'll shuffle Elixir of Immortality into its owner's library directly from the battlefield, if it's still there. £9/22/2011 : If Elixir of Immortality is in your graveyard at the time the ability resolves, you'll still wind up shuffling it into your library because you shuffle your entire graveyard into your library. If it's anywhere else by that time, including in another player's graveyard, it remains where it is and you shuffle just your graveyard into your library. £9/22/2011 : If you gain control of another player's Elixir of Immortality and activate it, the Elixir of Immortality will be shuffled into its owner's library and the cards in your graveyard will be shuffled into your library. You are considered to have shuffled each affected library (even if, as a shortcut, each player physically shuffles his or her own library).
ability: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

name: Elvish Mystic
flavor: #_"Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."—Nissa Revane_#
ability: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

name: Encroaching Wastes
flavor: #_Every world is a work in progress, constantly reshaped by time, disasters, and even the powerful magic of Planeswalkers._#
ability: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.£{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Encroaching Wastes: Destroy target nonbasic land.

name: Enlarge
ability: Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able. #_(If a creature with trample would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)_#

name: Essence Scatter
flavor: #_"What you attempt to pull from the Æther, I can spread onto the wind."—Jace Beleren_#
ruling: £10/1/2009 : A "creature spell" is any spell with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact or Enchantment. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature spells.
ability: Counter target creature spell.

name: Festering Newt
flavor: #_Its back bubbles like a witch's cauldron, and it smells just as vile._#
ability: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.

name: Fiendslayer Paladin
ability: First strike #_(This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)_# £Lifelink #_(Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)_#£Fiendslayer Paladin can't be the target of black or red spells your opponents control.

name: Fireshrieker
ability: Equipped creature has double strike. #_(It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)_#£Equip {2} #_({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)_#

name: Flames of the Firebrand
flavor: #_"You're in luck. I brought enough to share."—Chandra Nalaar_#
ruling: £7/1/2012 : You divide the damage as you cast Flames of the Firebrand, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 damage. (In other words, as you put the spell on the stack, you choose whether to have it deal 3 damage to a single target, 2 damage to one target and 1 damage to another target, or 1 damage to each of three targets.) £7/1/2012 : You can't deal damage to both a player and a planeswalker controlled by that player with Flames of the Firebrand.
ability: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

name: Fleshpulper Giant
flavor: #_He doesn't hate small folk. He just likes the squishing sound they make._#
ability: When Fleshpulper Giant enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with toughness 2 or less.

name: Fog
flavor: #_"I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else."—Lord Hilneth_#
ruling: £10/1/2009 : Fog has no effect on damage that's already been dealt.
ability: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Fortify
flavor: #_"Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith."—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis_#
ability: Choose one — Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn; or creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

name: Frost Breath
flavor: #_"I'll make ice chimes of your bones."_#
ruling: £9/22/2011 : If a creature affected by Frost Breath changes controllers before its old controller's next untap step, Frost Breath will prevent it from becoming untapped during its new controller's next untap step. £4/15/2013 : This spell can target tapped creatures. If a targeted creature is already tapped when the spell resolves, that creature just remains tapped and doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
ability: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
